generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
timeout: The request took too long. Try again.
validation: Invalid data. Check the fields and try again.

ai.quotaExceeded: AI quota exceeded. Try again in a few minutes or upgrade your plan.
ai.invalidRequest: Invalid request. Try rephrasing your message.
ai.safetyBlocked: Request blocked for safety reasons. Try rephrasing your message.
ai.modelUnavailable: Model unavailable. Try a different model.
ai.serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Try again shortly.
ai.requestTooLong: Request too long. Try a shorter message.
ai.messageTooLong: Message too long. Reduce the length or start a new conversation.
ai.internalError: Internal error. Try again in a few seconds.
ai.reasoningError: Reasoning error. Try rephrasing your message.
ai.noResponse: The model did not generate a response. Try a different prompt.

auth.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.
